name: Message Bus
description: Add a Message Bus Instance to connect your existing Message Bus account to the Messaging Hub, allowing you to send, receive and manage email and SMS messages etc. across multiple Messaging Elements. You will need your Message Bus account information, or use our trial account to add an instance.

configuration.name: Message Bus Recipient Complained Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Recipient Complained hook ID

configuration.name: Message Bus Filter Blocked Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Filter Blocked hook ID

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Max Page Size (or limit)
configuration.description: Message Bus Beta Max Page Size (or limit)

configuration.name: Event Notification Instance Finder
configuration.description: Message Bus Beta Event Notification Instance Finder

configuration.name: Pagination Type
configuration.description: Pagination Type

configuration.name: Base URL
configuration.description: Message Bus Beta Base URL

configuration.name: The Message Bus API Key
configuration.description: Your Message Bus API Key. This is used to authorize all requests to the Message Bus API

configuration.name: Message Bus Message Created Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Message Created hook ID

configuration.name: Message Bus Message Delivered Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Message Delivered hook ID

configuration.name: Message Bus Message Bounced Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Message Bounced hook ID

configuration.description: The Message Bus Message Opened hook ID

configuration.description: The Message Bus Message Deferred hook ID

configuration.name: Message Bus Link Clicked Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Link Clicked hook ID

configuration.name: Message Bus Recipient Unsubscribed Hook ID
configuration.description: The Message Bus Recipient Unsubscribed hook ID

configuration.name: Event Notification Subscription ID
configuration.description: The subscription ID for the webhook events subscription

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event Notification Basic Authentication UserName
configuration.description: Event Notification basic authentication username

configuration.name: Event Notification Basic Authentication Password
configuration.description: Event Notification basic authentication password

configuration.name: Enabled/Disable Event Notifications
configuration.description: Message Bus Beta Enabled/Disable Event Notifications

configuration.name: Event Notification Callback URL
configuration.description: Message Bus Beta Event Notification Callback URL

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload

resources.description: Send a new outgoing message using the messaging service provider.  A valid User Secret and Element Token are required in the HTTP request.

parameters.name: messages
parameters.description: Information about the message to be sent.
